name: Recovery (PixelTypist)
description:
Goal: Find four hearts to clear the dungeon while also avoiding the skeletons and managing your light resources.

Controls: 

 - Left click: toggle the lantern you're holding -- you can only safely do this when you're within a "cleared" zone, or else you'll lose health (the green bar at the top left of the screen).

 - Right click: drop a lantern -- this is useful for turning the skeletons into docile bunnies that cannot hurt you.

 - WASD/Arrow keys to move

 - Press Space to pause

Note: You start with 10 lanterns, and the one you're holding will get used up over time; you can see how much time you have left by referencing the gold bar at the top left of the screen. When it's used up, you'll automatically start using a different lantern; your remaining lantern count can be seen at the top left of the screen as well.
